---
name: V1.4 Output Config
on:
  issues:
    types: [opened]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened]
permissions:
  issues: write
  contents: write
outputs:
  add-comment: { max: 5 }
  add-label: true
  create-issue: { max: 3 }
  update-file: true
allowed-paths:
  - "docs/**/*"
  - "README.md"
allowed-actors:
  - admin
rate_limit_minutes: 10
---

# V1.4 Agent with Output Configuration

This represents v1.4 with output configuration objects.

Has max limits on outputs, allowed-paths for file operations, and rate limiting.
